Title: Establishes the crime of unlawful storage of a firearm leading to use in the commission of a crime
Summary: Establishes the crime of unlawful storage of a firearm leading to use in the commission of a crime which is a class E felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of unlawful storage of a firearm leading to use in the commission of a crime
